extendedInfo.description: Allows anyone with Grand Theft Auto Vice City for android to enter cheats into the game. Opens up the keyboard in game and displays a list of cheats available. No need for a physical keyboard anymore, everyone can cheat.Please read the troubleshooting or contact me before posting a 1* review. Half these comment are covered in the troubleshooting. Especially the people with the Galaxy Note, troubleshooting clearly tells you to download a specific keyboard if the cheats donât do anything.Important: Asking for a refund in a review will not get you a refund as there is no way to link a review to a purchase. Please contact directly.Instructions1.	Open cheater app and press âStart Cheaterâ.2.	Start the game.3.	While in game press the new âCheatâ button at the top of the screen.4.	Find the cheat you want.5.	Enter it in the on screen keyboard that opens.6.	When you finish playing, open the cheater app again and press âStop Cheaterâ to remove the âCheatâ button.Please note: Some combinations of cheats can cause the game to close e.g. spawning too many cars in one location and using multiple weapons cheats at once.

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Well worth the $ if u just want to have fun with the game. The update today was nice! Thank u..
reviews.author: Dave Thomason

reviews.title: Want Money Back
reviews.comment: If I use cheat, it will not  save, therefore I lose all of my  progress, and will not get that wasted time back! It no longer works....
reviews.author: terrence douglas

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy s3
reviews.comment: Hi every time I try and install a cheat it crashes, gta vice city and the cheat does not work for me :-(
reviews.author: Daniel Graham

reviews.title: Fix
reviews.comment: When i go into gta vice city and open the cheats the game crashes plz fix in next up date
reviews.author: greg garcia

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: When I type the cheat in,  it just crashes the game.  Fix please
reviews.author: Gajin Surujpaul

reviews.title: Not recommended for S4
reviews.comment: I downloaded this app on my Galaxy S4. Did not work and continued to crash and end the game.. save your money
reviews.author: Laine Emery

reviews.title: Crashes when I spawn a vehicle
reviews.comment: This app comes in handy for weapons cheats, health & armor cheat, money cheat, ect, but every time I type in a cheat to spawn a vehicle it crashes.
reviews.author: Adonis Tavares

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: I have the s3. I type in the cheats and it crashes. Waste of money better not buy it till bugs are fixed. I havnt restart my phone. But ill try that and see what happens. Youve been warmed
reviews.author: Brandon Kirkwood

reviews.title: I screwed up.
reviews.comment: Hi Jenko please I accidentally started led riot mode and peds with guns and accidentally saved please add a disable cheats function!
reviews.author: Colter Tolman

reviews.title: Easy/works
reviews.comment: Most cheats work. Though some major cheats crash. Only reason is because vice city is new with lots of unstable features and glitches. But it works, he also give quick email reply
reviews.author: Henry Montalto

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: Vice City works fine until I load this app and put in a cheat, the game freezes and closes. App works fine for GTA 3 but no luck with this one..please fix.
reviews.author: Mike English

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Great cheats although I had to start the game all over. It crashes with the car cheats. I think its no this app its GTA vice city that cannot support cheat codes
reviews.author: Andrei Luzanov

reviews.title: garbage
reviews.comment: Don\'t even bother... crashes every time cheats are entered. I WANT MY MONEY BACK
reviews.author: Kenneth Barki

reviews.title: Good but everyone just hijacks each other
reviews.comment: It\'s annoying everyone is screwed up
reviews.author: Nathaniel Smith

reviews.title: S3
reviews.comment: Everytime I try to type a code in it crashs, no crash issue when you dont try to type a code in.  Wth!  Please fix, would love to enjoy a little more.
reviews.author: will Johnson

reviews.title: Not the best
reviews.comment: GTA 3 cheater works good but Vice City not. Not all cheats works and then crashes game. Recommend not to buy. Please fix and make new update.
reviews.author: Gerhard Stroebel

reviews.title: Just crashes the game
reviews.comment: The game just crashes when you run a cheat. Might be the game itself being unstable but still worth noting before you buy this app. Im using a Samsung note 10.1
reviews.author: Edward Snow

reviews.title: Fix
reviews.comment: I tried cars can fly mod and it worked but turbo sabre crashed my phone (s3) and there maybe will be more cheats what crashes my phone so please fix it :)
reviews.author: Miro Laamanen

reviews.title: Could be better.
reviews.comment: Some cheats do work, just the odd small ones. You can\'t even spawn a banger without it crashing let alone have nice weapons. Currently it\'s a bit of a waste of even 79p. However if this is fixed then it will be much more fun. Just like it used to be! Please sort it out if possible!
reviews.author: Nik Miller

reviews.title: Love this!
reviews.comment: Random pedestrian cheat anyone? Unlimited health and armor? :D Thank you for putting your time to make this. :)
reviews.author: Christian Mangubat
